Validates an email using Mailbox Layer

    Signature

    public function emailValidateWithMailboxLayer(string $email )

    Parameters

    $email — string
    The email address to validate

    Returns

    array
    An result array where the first element is a boolean indicating whether the operation has gone ok or not, and the second element is a hash array of additional information.
